body.name: KSAN Mini Projector, Full HD 1080P Supported Portable Projector, Movie Projector for Outdoor Home Theater, 5.8G Wifi Screen Mirroring for Smartphone, BT 5.1, Compatible with Tablet TV Box PS5 Roku etc
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 40 mins
features: 【2024 Upgraded Smart Projector】KSAN phone projector updated with latest 5.8G wifi screen mirroring function and BT 5.1 for audio device connection technology. The “Screen Mirroring” function designed for iPhone and Android phone without using data cable connection.

【1080P Full HD Resolution Supported Proyector Portatil】LED illumination technology with 90,000 hours, which make projection picture brighter and clearer. Designed with compact size 6.8x5.5x2.8inch and 1.4lb weight, make the small projector easily carried.

【200'' Giant Projection Size Projector with Wifi】The outdoor small projector has projection size 35 inch ~ 200 inch, and the projection distance is 3.2 ft ~ 17 ft (The best projection distance is 6.5 ft ~ 9.8 ft). Built-in stereo speakers provides clear sound quality with noise reduction technology. Extra headsets or speakers can be connected via BT 5.1 to enhance your video watching experience.

【2-Years & 7x24h After-Sales Support】Please contact us if any problems while using the portable mini projector. It is NOT recommended for PPT and business presentation, this is a home theater projector.

The mini projector for iphone and android phone compatible with HDMI, USB, Fire Stick, PS5, Tablet, Laptop, PC, TV Box, TV Stick, X-Box, Android iOS Windows devices. ★★★NOTE: Due to limited by Apps copyright, Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc. can only played via TV Stick, Roku, etc.★★★

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Family Entertainment Projector The KSAN movie projector supports projection on desk, tripod and ceiling. =X= Upgraded with latest 5.8G wi-fi screen mirroring function and BT 5.1 for audio device connection technology, this means most of applications from your smartphone can be projected via the KSAN projector, which will bring you much better home theater experience. 1080P Full HD Resolution Supported.200'' Giant Projection Size.Compatible with iOS, Android, Windows devices.Please NOTE: Due to limited by Apps copyright, some apps may not support screen mirroring function unless you have that apps paid member account.

Faster 5.8G WiFi Data Transmission Technology The KSAN mini projector designed for iPhone and android phone with 5.8G WiFi screen mirroring connection, which will provide much more faster and stable data transmission, NO data cable connection needed.Please NOTE: The Screen Mirroring function name for Samsung Android phone named "Smart View", and the function name for OnePlus phone named "Screencast". Different Android devices have different names and positions for the screen mirroring function, please refer to the manual of your android device.

The LED illumination designed with 90,000 hours lamp life and 1080P full hd resolution supported, which makes projection picture much more brighter and clearer.Please NOTE: It's not recommended for PPT and business presentation, this is a home theater & game projector.
The USB port support max 5TB.Please NOTE: Due to limited by Apps copyright, Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc. can only played via TV Stick, Roku, etc.
What's in the box? 1 x Projector1 x HDMI Cable1 x Remote Control1 x Power Cord1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and works great
reviews.reviewText: Portable and easy to use! Great in a small room! Built in speaker is a bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and Many connection options!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for the price. I love that there is multiple ways to stream content! We did it from our laptop, phone, even our Apple TV! The picture is great quality and the audio on the projector alone is loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This portable projector is awesome! Arrived in great condition and you can use it for either indoor or outdoors! All you need is a blank wall or a huge rock if you’re outdoors camping, or use in your garage, backyard, etc. If you want to show Netflix or Hulu you’ll need a TV stick or Roku, otherwise it’ll play movies and videos uploaded on your phone! It’s amazing, works great, clear picture & sound and fun for the whole family or use at work for a meeting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is easy to set up and quite in operation
reviews.reviewText: I use this portable mini projector to be an everyday TV replacement in my living room. It is easy to set up and quiet in operation. It excels with movies in a dark room. It offers great image contrast and color accuracy. In addition, it produces a satisfying rich image for a living room size home theater. I am happy with the price and quality of this mini projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a steal! This is a great little option for movie night. Product was packaged well and is easy to use. Sound is amazing! I'm glad in my choice to order this product. Well made. 5 stars from us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good projector！
reviews.reviewText: I love this projector. i used it for my family movie night，It has good sound and good picture quality. Definitely worth the price！

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The KSAN 2023 Upgraded Smart Projector is a game-changer! The wireless screen mirroring and BT 5.1 audio connectivity are super convenient. The projection size and clear sound make for a great home theater experience. Just note, it's not suitable for business presentations. Overall, a fantastic projector for entertainment. It's become an essential part of my entertainment setup, and I'm loving every moment of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great visual quality and sound too! Love it!!
